scripts.build_linux_amd64: pkg index.js -t node18-linux-x64 -c package.json --compress GZip -o serial_data-linux_amd64
scripts.build_linux_arm64: pkg index.js -t node18-linux-arm64 -c package.json --compress GZip -o serial_data-linux_arm64
scripts.build_win_amd64: pkg index.js -t node18-win-x64 -c package.json --compress GZip -o serial_data-windows_windows_amd64
scripts.build_win_arm64: pkg index.js -t node18-win-arm64 -c package.json --compress GZip -o serial_data-windows_arm64
